com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IUsesExternalProduct

All Known Subinterfaces:
IHLLAPIDocumentServer, ITCPIPDocumentServer
public interface IUsesExternalProduct

A class implements IUsesExternalProduct to indicate that it requires an external product to run.

Method Summary
 String getVendorDLLPath()
          Returns the OS specific path to the vendor's DLL or shared library.
 String getVendorName()
          Returns the name of the vendor.

          Sets the OS specific path to the vendor's DLL or shared library.

          Sets the name of the vendor.
